The house itself was very clean. When we walked in the we could the fresh smell of a clean house.
We used the hot tub and it was delightful and functional. We didn't spend a lot of time on the beautiful wrap around porch because of the weather but we would love to come back and use the grill and large patio furniture and just enjoy nature on it.

I always bring my own but if you typically rely on your rental to supply everything, go ahead and pack them this time. Again, this is not a big deal to me but something to pass along.

If you’re looking for a cabin stay, look no further!
This cabin is perfect from the hot tub in the front, to the wooded area on the back porch. The porch wraps around beautifully there is an excellent 6 burner gas grill, and a propane heater to keep you comfortable while drying off from the hot tub.
There are plenty of comfortable places to sit outside and view all the wildlife (we see deer from the back porch every time we visit).
Inside is just as awesome as the outside. High ceilings, cozy couches, a 70” tv, and a perfect fireplace.
The kitchen is one of the best I’ve seen in a cabin, large and updated. The beds are comfy and there are Roku tvs in both of the large bedrooms.
The hosts are quickly responsive and helpful. This place has a special, relaxing, and rejuvenating atmosphere.
